title: Wild Hanpen
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>TORYAAAH! URYAAAH!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>W-, wow....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin is not done yet~! YOISHOOO!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch5206/>Nnyaaaaaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’ve never seen Hanpen like this before. Rina-chan’s board「Spinning」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Alright! Good girl, Hanpen! There there! You were really agile, and your movements were so sharp!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>R-, Rin-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hm?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I didn’t realize until now.... how amazing Hanpen is. How I played with her wasn’t able to draw her true potential. From now on, I want to do more active plays with her. So please, can you.... teach me how to play with Hanpen! Rina-chan’s board「Bow」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Is that so? Rin doesn’t really understand, but.... leave it to me nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
